reviews.userName: POF stands for Plenty of Fakes
reviews.title: trash app. Wish I could give negative 5 stars!
reviews.text:
Let’s be very clear. This app is a complete and utter scam. Do NOT send them any money!  

I paid the fee to join the service thinking I would be able to get some quick moving hauling jobs and build a side income this way.  

I submitted to literally 90% to 95% of the supposedly “available” jobs on the app and got ZERO responses back from hundreds of communications!  Couldn’t even get a “piss off!” Or a “no thanks”!  

And when I communicated my displeasure via customer support I also got ZERO response back and it’s not been well over a month since I joined.  

Wow! So incredible that this app is even here trying to scam people some more! 

You have been warned! 

I truly wish I could give this app less than a 1 star! A negative five stars would be more appropriate

reviews.title: Legit app
reviews.text:
I signed up a month ago and had a hard time navigating to find the LOCAL moving jobs but they just updated the app to show me only local moving jobs. Now it’s 100 times better and it’s easy to find the quick moving gigs
Keep up the good work!

reviews.title: Legit
reviews.text: Excellent app, Since I signed up I’ve made decent money

reviews.title: Terrible app
reviews.text: Terrible App, I can’t go into the job and see the details of it. So I have apply for the job, whatever that means smh in order to actually see any details. Waste of money and there’s now way that I have seen to close my account so it will stop taking money out for a service I can’t use.

reviews.title: *******DONT DO IT*******
reviews.text: I saw your ad on Craigslist in Sacramento. I download for iOS. I had to accept a job and then abruptly reject the job just to see the location. I was charged a non refundable fee but can’t get any assistance. Had work orders that just disappeared. Customer service is the worst.

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.text: Decent leads but location is not visible until after you apply, wastes time. Most of the apps text in the application/profile is black on black and hard to read. Could be a great service with a little fixing.

reviews.title: Scam
reviews.text: I got this app to make money while in college thinking it’d be a good idea, but it’s impossible to work on. I made my account almost 2 months ago and my profile hasn’t been verified. I was just charged AGAIN for the registration fee (35$ so 70$ now) for “activating” my account. Absolute scam and waste of money.

reviews.title: REALLY NEEDS WORK
reviews.text: I was excited once I came across the opportunity to utilize this app to make some money on the side. I quickly realized that after the $35 “non-refundable” registration fee, they really don’t care. They app really isn’t functional to efficiently communicate with those seeking help (coming from the movers perspective). There is no way to view the location of the job you HAVE to apply to in order for the location to be shown. The contact information isn’t available either. I still have a message in customer support (via the app) that hasn’t been responded to (sent on 3/12/20 @2:19pm). I’ve also sent a follow up email. Still no response. Overall, I completely wasted my $35 and I regret spending it with this company. Please stay away. You’ve been warned. I would’ve given 0 starts if I could.

reviews.title: Difficult navigation
reviews.text: It’s good that I can see leads but . I cannot see their locations until I contact them. Which is time wasting . When I contact 1 might be located  in New York meanwhile another is in Texas but no leads I can see for those near me.

reviews.title: Not that many leads
reviews.text: I signed up 4 days ago and there isn’t that many jobs available and the ones that are available are out of state unless the app needs some fixing or there’s not that many leads here I regret paying $35 to start

reviews.title: Good leads
reviews.text: The moment your approved to be on the platform There are many people looking for movers. Better then other platforms I signed up for

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.text: Great way to make money with your truck or pickup
